Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

Malice's sophisticated senses detected someone outside his door.  He quickly sat up, and threw a mono wire at the door lock and activated it.  There stood the one Rodimus called Nightlight, his wife.  He shoved his energon locker to the farthest corner, he knew she would not enjoy a case of energon poisoning.  He stood and offered his seat on the bed.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:Nighlight/elita:

Nighlight took Elita in her armsand she looked around nod body was 
watching her. she decided to came back to her room. She slowly was 
arriving to the room where Rodimus and �Malice were


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> AzureBlade snorted deriively at Cheetor. Then, he sent, back to 
> Shadimus, an image of a ravaged Cybertron, where the Maximals were 
> enslaved by... Decepticons?
> 
> AzureBlade: You should know that we will both make the difference 
in 
> the War against Unicron. We cannot win if we kill each other. 
Would 
> you be responsible for Unicron eating the original Optimus Prime 
and 
> banishing Cybertron to eternal war?
> 
> He starts walking stoically past Shadimus.
> 
> AzureBlade: And, I do know full well the extent of what I have 
done, 
> or rather what I have endured, Decepticon. Should you try to kill 
> me, or even to fight me, you would not be any different from your 
> original programming.
> 
> He waits a few moments, waiting for a reaction.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "OMWOS" 
> <o_mighty_wife_of_shinigami@y...> wrote:
> > Cheetor moved quietly around the mess hall and towards to where 
> the 
> > sound had indicated from. "What's all the commotion?," he asked, 
> > glancing towards AzureBlade in his beast mode. He then turned to 
> the 
> > stranger, before looking behind him.
> > 
> > "Ah did I miss something?" he eyed the stranger one last time. 
Who 
> was 
> > this bot? He hadn't seen him around before... had he?
> > 
> > OMWOS
